com.beaglebuddy.id3.v23.frame_body

Class ID3v23FrameBodyComments

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.beaglebuddy.util.Utility
      • com.beaglebuddy.id3.v23.frame_body.ID3v23FrameBodyUtility
        • com.beaglebuddy.id3.v23.frame_body.ID3v23FrameBody
          • com.beaglebuddy.id3.v23.frame_body.ID3v23FrameBodyComments

  • public class ID3v23FrameBodyComments
extends ID3v23FrameBody

    A comments frame body is associated with an ID3v2.3 COMM frame which is intended for any kind of full text information that does not fit in any other frame. The comments frame body contains the following fields:

    Comments Frame Body Fields
     FieldDescription
    1.encodingcharacter set used to encode the description and text fields.
    2.languagelanguage the comments are written in.
    3.description short description of the comments. This field is optional and be left empty ("").
    4.text actual comments about the .mp3 file.

    There may be more than one comment frame in an ID3v2.3 tag, but only one with the same language and description fields.

    See Also:
    ID3v23Frame, ID3 tag version 2.3.0 standard, wikipedia history of ID3 tags

    • Constructor Detail

      • ID3v23FrameBodyComments

        public ID3v23FrameBodyComments()
        The default constructor is called when creating a new frame. The default values used are:
        • ISO-8859-1 encoding
        • english language
        • empty description
        • empty comments

      • ID3v23FrameBodyComments

        public ID3v23FrameBodyComments(Encoding encoding,
                       Language language,
                       java.lang.String description,
                       java.lang.String text)
        This constructor is called when creating a new frame.
        Parameters:
        encoding - character set used to encode the description field.
        language - ISO-639-2 language code indicating the language the comments were written in.
        description - short description of the comment.
        text - actual comment text.

      • ID3v23FrameBodyComments

        public ID3v23FrameBodyComments(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                       int frameBodySize)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor is called when reading in an existing frame from an .mp3 file. This is then followed by a call to the parse() method.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - input stream pointing to a comments frame body in the .mp3 file.
        frameBodySize - size (in bytes) of the frame's body.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error while reading the frame body.

      • setBuffer

        public void setBuffer()
        If the frame body's values have been modified, then resize the raw binary buffer and store the new values there. When finished, the dirty flag is reset to indicate that the buffer is up to date, and the frame is now ready to be saved to the .mp3 file.
        Overrides:
        setBuffer in class ID3v23FrameBody

        Returns:
        a string representation of the frame body.
